title: PBE Warwick Bug
body:
Before you tell me to post it on PBE boards, I keep getting a 404 trying to log into PBE boards on my phone. Playing a bot game to get a feel for his kit when I came upon this interesting bug (not the fail flash)
https://www.instagram.com/p/BPHFy2cAqiS/
I believe I tried to q during ult, I have napped since then so I'm not sure. Oh, also if the unit dies during your ult then you are frozen until it would end

replies.body: Hey bud thanks for the report! The issue where Warwick is unable to move after killing someone with his ult for a brief moment is on our radar and being fixed. I'll see if I can get a solid reproduction of the first issue you recorded!
Read the first part, can't log into my pbe boards, 404 message
